author: USA TODAY, Adrianna Rodriguez, USA TODAY
title: When will we reopen the country? Antibody testing may help officials decide, experts say
description: Surgeon General Jerome Adams said Friday that "most of the country" will not be able to open by May 1. How can antibody testing help?
content:
The coronavirus (COVID-19) is impacting the global economy and raising fears of a recession. What causes a recession and what are the signs?
USA TODAY
